column1: Fault code Fault name    Description                                            Whether it affects the output or not
【01】   BatVoltLow      Battery undervoltage alarm                             Yes
【02】   BatOverCurrSw   Battery discharge average current overcurrent software Yes
【03】   BatOpen         Battery not-connected alarm                            Yes
【04】   BatLowEod       Battery undervoltage stop discharge alarm              Yes
【05】   BatOverCurrHw   Battery overcurrent hardware protection                Yes
【06】   BatOverVolt     Charging overvoltage protection                        Yes
【07】   BusOverVoltHw   Bus overvoltage hardware protection                    Yes
【08】   BusOverVoltSw   Bus overvoltage software protection                    Yes
【09】   PvVoltHigh      PV overvoltage protection                              No
【10】   PvBuckOCSw      Buck overcurrent software protection                   No
【11】   PvBuckOCHw      Buck overcurrent hardware protection                   No
【12】   bLineLoss       Mains power down                                       No
【13】   OverloadBypass  Bypass overload protection                             Yes
【14】   OverloadInverterInverter overload protection                           Yes
【15】   AcOverCurrHw    Inverter overcurrent hardware protection               Yes
【17】   InvShort        Inverter short circuit protection                      Yes
【19】   OverTemperMppt  Buck heat sink over temperature protection             No
【20】   OverTemperInv   Inverter heat sink over temperature protection         Yes
【21】   FanFail         Fan failure                                            Yes
【22】   EEPROM          Memory failure                                         Yes
【23】   ModelNumErr     Model setting error                                    Yes
【26】   RlyShort        Inverted AC Output Backfills to Bypass AC Input        Yes
【29】   BusShort        Internal battery boost circuit failure                 Yes
